pages.text: The room with a square symbol must be a laboratory.$(br2) It seems that they tried to enhance charms durability here.$(br) $(o)Which is not surprising, as charm bases that I have seen were very fragile.

There is a note carved on the table. It says:$(br2)$(o) Something strange is happening, the lamps emit almost no light and our chief has lost his mind, he is running and shouting all kinds of nonsense:$(br) wait execution act long loss warn innocent lost line pain effort rain in silver history old union root grace observer duty stay air remain eternal decay eye art drop
